data.title: Service and food both bad
data.text: The name sounds inviting. Went in there and sat at the bar. Bartender looked right at me and kept working. I finally asked her for a drink and then had to request the one page menu. Ordered a cheeseburger and was asked to pay when I ordered. I see why. Got to witness two customer confrontations over slow service while I waited a really long time for food that was kinda hot and had no flavor. Next time, McDonalds.

data.title: State Pool Tournament - 2016
data.text: We made the mistake of having lunch here.  The menu was limited (a single sheet of paper), the service was lacking & the food was mediocre, at best.  Even though there were only a few other people in the whole place, it took forever to get our food.  When it finally arrived, we had to ask our server for silverware, napkins, ketchup & drink refills.  There is no doubt that we won't be going back...ever!

data.title: Wait for food is ridiculous
data.text: This was honestly one of the worst restaurants in terms of service I have ever dinned at. Took over an hour to get our food and my simple cup of coffee took almost thirty minutes. Sad part was, we were the ONLY table in the restaurant so I'm not sure why service was so slow. The food however was fine. Nothing to brag about. After the service we received I was cringing at the thought of what the food may be like, but was pleasantly surprised to find that it wasn't horrible. They need a restaurant manager who knows what they are doing and can train staff better. Overall, this place is terribly mismanaged.

data.title: Equal Opportunity Employer, these Employees are Dumb!
data.text: It took 45 minutes to get a freaking cup of coffee from the waitress. The bartender had NO IDEA what beers they offered or what their wine selection was. The service was incredibly slow, the staff was not informed as to meal or alcohol selections. They must be an equal opportunity employer because the staff here was so incredibly special (in a bad way) WOW is all I have to say. Between the hotel and this restaurant I'm shocked that they are able to keep their doors open.
